{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( <>
{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.foodName}
{item.foodRestaurant}
â‚¹{item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.quantity}
{/* Delete Icon */}
removeFromCart(item)}>
))}
Total Price: â‚¹{totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
) : (
No items in the cart
Add Items
Scroll like a{' '} foodie
)}
) } export default Cart
